ygData.subject: RE: It's a sad, sad day
ygData.msgSnippet: Well everyone, kiss the usefullness of advanced tinkering goodbye.  It turns out that magicians are now going to get a new spell at level 20 that replaces the
ygData.messageBody:
Well everyone, kiss the usefullness of advanced
tinkering goodbye. It turns out that magicians are
now going to get a new spell at level 20 that replaces
the current heatstone spell. The new spell will
summon stones that have 5 charges each of Enduring
Breath. So don't invest any more plat into
lungs/rebreathers/etc unless you have orders paid in
full up front. No one will buy them.

Seems that Verant feels the need to nerf all trade
skills, and they were so kind as to let us invest
thousands of plat before knifing us in the back. Make
sure you all use /feedback and tell Verant just how
thankful you are for this change.

Oh well, now I can go buy more tinkerers bags.

Gazamel Prime
Solusek Ro
Dealers of Death
